website_summaries.verdict: Intel's revamped Compute Stick promises a computer in every pocket, just be prepared for an entry-level experience, although it's still fine for email, social media and movies.
pros: The pocket-size Intel Compute Stick adds several improvements for its second generation, and it works great for casual Web surfing and HD media streaming
cons: Very little storage, so installing apps or downloading movies is difficult
Despite the streamlined design, extra cables and adapters make for a tangled presentation

customer_reviews.title: DEAD AFTER WINDOWS UPDATE - NO REFUND - OVERHEATED
customer_reviews.text: Very poor design, quality and customer service from Intel. I used this only a few times over the period of a year, mostly just to play with for fun. When I booted it after several months it required a Windows Update, which CAUSED IT TO OVERHEAT. It was literally hanging from the TV, with plenty of venitlation. The Intel team recognized the flaw but still provided no recourse for replacing or refunding the item. I am going to contact Amazon to see if they will step in, because they are usually amazing. I would NOT recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: techgeek

customer_reviews.title: It worked on a 4k TV!
customer_reviews.text: These things support 4K! They probably don't have the processing power to run any major applications at 4k, but I was super surprised when I plugged one into a 4k TV and it actually went full resolution (3840x2160). These are great. I got several of them almost a year ago, and they are all working fine so far. My only issues have been caused by automatic Windows 10 updates (ARG!) which isn't Intel's fault. They are more than powerful enough for my needs (playing videos, presentations etc... on display TVs).
customer_reviews.author: C. Stork

customer_reviews.title: Amazing performance for its size
customer_reviews.text: I waited until the new model of the Intel Compute stick came out after reading reviews of major limitations in the previous model. The new model offers very acceptable performance for basic tasks such as office or web browsing. It is not a device that you will do lots of HD video editing on, but it is not aimed at that. It can be hidden nicely behind a TV and works well with a bluetooth keyboard and mouse. Nice having USB 3.0 port in addition to the USB 2.0 port. Comes with micro USB power adapter, note that this is a 3A power adapter, much higher power than most cellphone chargers.
customer_reviews.author: SJScot

customer_reviews.title: Intel got it
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Finally it made my Samsung TV smart! (Samsung CPU is garbage) Play HD fine from my NAS Fast wireless connection Its so good, that Im considering to use it as my Media server, due to its very low power usage and good processing power & wireless connection speed. I cant imagine how M3 & M5 will be
customer_reviews.author: Tche_leao

customer_reviews.title: and it works great. Like others have mentioned
customer_reviews.text: I used this to run VLC and a torrent client to my 55" in TV, and it works great. Like others have mentioned, it does run hot, so I have a small USB fan inside my TV cabinet to vent the amp and this stick. I've had it now for a month and no issues. Certainly a great price point and form factor for what I use it for in my entertainment setup.
customer_reviews.author: Edgey

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent of the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I use this with an LG 42" plasma tv and it is well worth the cost. I don't even watch tv anymore only movies and such available on the many free apps. Updates fast w/ 32 gb ssd. I have a 32 gb sd card plugged in the sd card slot, a 128 GB flash drive and a mouse dongle plugged into the usb 3 slots.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Died suddenly
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use this compute stick all that much, but when I did decide to try and use it, it lasted about 10 minutes and died. I would NOT buy another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: R. M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Limited
customer_reviews.text: This compute stick is very limited. Prepare for your resources to be maxed out just by running google chrome.
customer_reviews.author: The Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: I think the use case for these is really narrow and we found we could not use it as we wanted but were able to repurpose it as a conference room computer.
customer_reviews.author: G. C. Mason

customer_reviews.title: All I can say is WOW, I've been messing ...
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW, I've been messing with computers for a long time, Build them , repair, modify I bought this a a tinker toy! GEEZ it does it all. Now it won't run high powered games, but browsing, emailingyou got it. Man a computer that fits in the palm of your hand
customer_reviews.author: Otilio De Jesus Jr

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with performance except still have problem accessing/activating Windows 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to get setup with a remote keyboard and mouse. Very happy with performance except still have problem accessing/activating Windows 10 Store and other windows tiles. Briefly opens and then closes.
customer_reviews.author: SysEngPAF

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed at how small it was.
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the compute stick. Very nice, small and works great. I received it quickly and at a great price. I would recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good performance for common tasks and watching videos, but do not overload it, just load a couple of apps at a time and you will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Di Santolo

customer_reviews.title: I just love this little device
customer_reviews.text: I just love this little device .. Btw for the avg suffer office user .. It's super fast !! And the fact u and throw in your bag and bring it to any hotel room while business travel is great !! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bell

customer_reviews.title: A great media streaming -- and a "real" PC!
customer_reviews.text: I attached this to my tv, and now use it as a way to watch youtube (through youtube.com/leanback), twitch, and SlingTV. Works great -- it is amazing how small and quiet a full-featured PC can be
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery. Item as described. Low current draw ...
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery. Item as described. Low current draw. Using it with a 12 VDC RV TV/Display for a long-life battery powered computer. Runs Windows 10 Home and apps.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the price decent would recommend to a friend definitely worth the money spent on it .
customer_reviews.author: Kimc

customer_reviews.title: needs more ram
customer_reviews.text: if it had 4GB of ram it would be more useful. Sometimes it loses sound and I have to reload sound driver.
customer_reviews.author: HoldenRider

customer_reviews.title: An extremely compact PC!
customer_reviews.text: All you need are an HDMI monitor and an Intel Remote Keyboard application to use this tiny computer.
customer_reviews.author: burentogunter

customer_reviews.title: The stick arrived on time and works great. I use it to drive a large marquee ...
customer_reviews.text: The stick arrived on time and works great. I use it to drive a large marquee LED Touchscreen monitor that streams data from various websites in a kiosk format. I was concerned that there wouldn't be enough RAM but it is very responsive in my application.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This stick is a great media device to second as a shared computer. Intel did a great job keeping its form factor and upgrading its performance. Though, this particular unit does not have the capability to sleep or hibernate. Nevertheless, it was a great buy and perfect present for my dad.
customer_reviews.author: Nshidbaby!

customer_reviews.title: Great Windows PC in your pocket
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday on my big tv to watch movies, streams and youtube. It is very small, very easy it use. Strongly recommended for multimedia users.
customer_reviews.author: Hasan CAKIR

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a TV that is on the wall and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a TV that is on the wall and you want it set up to browse the web
customer_reviews.author: Roger L Pohl

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, I bought 2GB of ram
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, I bought 2GB of ram, if you need something quick with not to much power suits you perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffry Villalobos C

customer_reviews.title: Great little product for surfing
customer_reviews.text: Great little product for surfing. We use it to monitor security cameras and it does a bang up job.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kasson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and versatile internet streamer with some limitations
customer_reviews.text: Streams internet content at 1080p better than my Surface Pro 3. Would not recommend for RAM intensive PC applications.
customer_reviews.author: Ingenious Ingenuity Inc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for getting it to me it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cncmartian

customer_reviews.title: Good for small things like skype and youtube
customer_reviews.text: Good for small things like skype and youtube. Will strouggle when trying to do 2 things at once. Good delivery and good quality. Recommended as smart TV.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tayler

customer_reviews.title: Good but could use some fine tuning
customer_reviews.text: The 2nd generation intel compute stick was just like a full tower computer. The only issue I have is with video play after a hour, it starts to hesitate a little.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a moment..  i need a stable device
customer_reviews.text: Would have been perfect if it worked. But playing simple mp4 video 24/7 resulted in only achieving stability for at most 4 hours. While the stick does work for a moment in the scheme of things if you want two moments of stability look elsewhere. Tested with several media players including daum, vic, and wmc
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Just wasted 160$
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 3 months. Then window wont boot, safety mode wont work, system repair wont work, recovery wont work... . Tried to contact vendor, no answer. Just wasted 160$
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Works fine on newer t
customer_reviews.text: Prompt Delivery. Product as described although resolution on older LCD t.v. a bit out. Works fine on newer t.v.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I tried smart TVs & Chromecast devices but wanted more
customer_reviews.text: I tried smart TVs & Chromecast devices but wanted more. The compute stick has Win 10 installed and it has worked perfectly. It does not have a lot of internal memory & processing power and I did not expect that. It has two USB ports (USB 2 & 3). I used one port for my Bluetooth devices and I added a powered USB hub so that I could leave thumb drives installed for additional memory storage & room for other devices. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: WA AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: This product is like a desktop
customer_reviews.text: This product is like a desktop, except that you buy separately and use a wireless keyboard with it. Two reasons I don't give two more stars is It uses a different web browser, . . . Bright side is it is a PC, well basically and really portable except it needs a wire for power supply, included. Reminds me of e machines. . . Not quite performance. Portability and Cheap
customer_reviews.author: J. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Just needed it for emedia Piano and keyboard method v3. It does more.
customer_reviews.text: I just need this to run emedia piano and keyboard method v3. I had been told it could not do this. Am happy it runs this application perfectly. I can't complain then. However I found the wifi a bit unstable. Its gone beyond my expectations. I have installed other software in addition eg. to enable rdp etc... Still have 15gb free.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Asare-Nyako

customer_reviews.title: Fail!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. Said missing setup files. Tried reboot. Failed several times. Amazon processed refund well, however.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i used it for teaching because its small It's. Very good
customer_reviews.author: mahmood

customer_reviews.title: Got wrong item instead
customer_reviews.text: Probably not fair to give this rating to this product, but wanted to reach out to other people wanting to buy this unit from Buy Wholesale Prices. Even thought the description clears states that the unit is 2nd gen, I got 1st gen instead. If you are buying this, check to see if you got a unit with 2 USB ports. If you got a unit with 1 USB 2.0 port, it's 1st gen, which is about $50 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Shin

customer_reviews.title: Caution.
customer_reviews.text: Device failed to boot up once out of the box. I'm having to send it back to Intel for a replacement. If the replacement does not perform, I will pursue a different device.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Mills

customer_reviews.title: this is not expected from Intel as they are supposed to study the product capacity and all use case scenarios and after that but
customer_reviews.text: it's keep restarting specially when I opened many tasks such as you tube , movies , office, so I think this is because the load on the processor. this is not expected from Intel as they are supposed to study the product capacity and all use case scenarios and after that but the suitable resources such as a CPU isted of the current poor and bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Anas Ruzz

product_meta.title: Intel Compute Stick CS125 Computer Atom x5 Processor and Windows 10 (BOXSTK1AW32SCR)
product_meta.description: A new way to plug into home entertainment, the Intel Compute Stick lets you transform any HDMI display into a full computer. Loaded with Windows 10 and ready to go out-of-the-box, the newly redesigned Intel Compute Stick has a quad-core Intel Atom x5 processor for the performance, quality, and value you expect from Intel.
feature_bullets: 1.44 GHz Intel Atom x5-Z8300 Quad-Core, 2GB of DDR3L RAM
Intel HD Graphics, HDMI / USB 2.0 / USB 3.0
Micro-SDXC Memory Card Slot, 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.0

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars103 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
